setting.name: uri
setting.description: A uri to the audio source, either for the purpose of downloading or for streaming.

setting.name: name
setting.description: A short descriptive name for the audio.

setting.name: description
setting.description: A descriptive text for the audio file. For example: “Sales queue audio loop”.

setting.name: local-store
setting.description: If set, then the audio source is an audio file which resides on this servers local audio store. If a copy of the audio file does not currently exist in the local store, then an attempt to download it from the location specified by the uri attribute will be made. Otherwise, if set to FALSE, the audio is sourced from a remote streaming source specified by the uri attribute.
